Plot: The upper-class owner of a gallery, Catherine Lelievre, hires the efficient and quiet maid Sophie to work in the family manor in the French countryside. Her husband Georges Lelievre, who is...
Title: La Cérémonie
Writer: Ruth Rendell (novel), Claude Chabrol, Caroline Eliacheff
